metadata.title: CVE-2020-13577 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A denial-of-service vulnerability exists in the WS-Security pluginfunctionality of Genivia gSOAP 2.8.107. A specially crafted SOAP requestcan lead to denial of service. An attacker can send an HTTP request totrigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: gsoap package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
